p.d: On holiday in a summer camp, Lisa, Matt, Bryan and their cousins discover a world inhabited by the legendary Flapacha. They camp in the woods, play, meet strange animals and are obliged to respect the curfew put in place by Odile, the director, and Hippolyte, the scout. Directed by: Jean Cayrol, Frédéric Martin, Fanny Courtillot (season 2, France, 2015)
